text: Mndewa loyawele yokola, mloli nakamlilila yolonga, “Mkulu, heni chitumagwa wa hegwe nandali kuli kitowa ngondo, nakoya mwamizi yumwe nakengalila munhu yumwe yebatigwe na kundonjela, ‘Mlolele munhu ayu, wone yasulupuche yokulapa hegwe kulipa kikala kwa hegwe ama kwa vihande elufu zidatu vya sendi.’
